entries.text: Failure to respond appropriately to emotional bids can lead to misunderstandings, resentment, and decreased relationship satisfaction.
Insufficient scheduling of dedicated one-on-one time may lead to feelings of neglect and relationship strain.
Failure to maintain scheduled rituals may result in a lack of shared experiences and connection.
Neglecting special activities can diminish shared joy and commitment.
Inadequate attention to solo time needs can cause stress and conflict.
Ineffective stress management can impact individual well-being and relationship dynamics.
Allowing the Four Horsemen to dominate conflict can lead to unresolved issues, resentment, and potential breakup.
Failure to follow established principles and rules may compromise the overall health of the relationship.
